children.name: Demographics
children.description: Variables related to personal and household demographics.

children.name: Basic Information
children.description: Basic demographic information such as age, sex, education, marital status, race, and family structure.

children.name: Household
children.description: Household characteristics including weight, presence of children, family structure, rent, income, and food expenses.

children.name: KIDS
children.description: Number of children in the household.

children.name: FOODAWAY
children.description: Expenditure on food away from home.

children.name: Labor Force
children.description: Variables related to labor force participation and earnings.

children.name: Employment
children.description: Variables related to employment status, occupation categories, and industry categories.

children.name: Earnings
children.description: Variables pertaining to various sources of earnings including wages, business income, interest and dividend income, and more.

children.name: SSRETINC
children.description: Income from social security and retirement.

children.name: Financial Behavior
children.description: Variables related to saving, spending, and financial events.

children.name: BNKRUPLAST5
children.description: Bankruptcy history in the last 5 years.

children.name: KNOWL
children.description: Knowledge about financial risks and behaviors.
